name: 3 Dot Mid Flight
description:
3 Dot Mid Flight

I was the sole developer on 3 Dot Mid Flight, though I utilised free assets from the Unity Asset Store and Itch.io to provide much of the art.  Furthermore, the music was sourced from public domain and royalty-free websites.

I created the movement, combat, enemy behaviour, shaders, and music-based light and spawning system myself in C# and HLSL.

This project was created for educational purposes as part of my studies at University of East London.
